content: this pattern uses up your scrap yarn and it is written in one size as this is an accessory gauge swatch is not essential for this project you will need 5 different colours and sizes of yarn in order to make the collar as textured and coloured as possible but feel free to make it in unicolour the pattern is written in us terms but there is a conversion chart for uk terms within the pattern it is written to be a free pattern and it will always be free you can share your makes on instagram by tagging me stopnhook /people/stopnhook or you can email me the pictures via stopnhookbusiness@gmail com i hope you enjoy this pattern and it makes your day once you put it on
